alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Lincoln (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:57AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Webster, southern Claiborne, north central Bienville and northwestern Lincoln Parishes through 430 AM CDT... At 357 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Homer to near Minden. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Arcadia, Gibsland, Dubach, Athens, Lisbon, Holly Springs, Mount Zion, Aycock, Spring Lake, Lake Clairborne and Corinth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
